title: The Complete Illustrated Works of  Oscar Wilde

* BOTH versions of 'Dorian Gray' Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the original magazine version and the original book version with extra chapters, all with separate contents tables

This is the COMPLETE WORKS of the great literary giant Oscar Wilde, with every play - even the very rare ones - poem, essay and much, much more!
